name: Affirmations with Echo
description:
A sprinkle of good vibes you can play directly in your browser!

Recite uplifting affirmations with Echo, an adorable feline, who will happily wake up from her nap to help bring a smile to your face.

Enjoy a random affirmation generator you can go back to whenever you are craving a dose of positivity anytime of the day.

Hundreds of affirmations to remind you that you are worth it and are deserving of happiness. You can play as long as you would like:

  • Recite one or two affirmations to start your day.
  • End your day with a positive reminder.
  • Recite affirmations until you've boosted your mood enough.
  • You decide when to stop.

Bookmark the page and visit Echo as often as you would like. She will always be glad to keep you company when you're feeling down or just want to be in the presence of a cheerful kitty.

NOTES:

  • WEB GAME | The game may take a bit of time to load on your first try. Booting up will get faster on succeeding tries once your computer has saved enough cache.
  • DOWNLOADS | You can download the game for Windows and Mac for better access and usability. No more long loading time in the browsers.
